title: Reading on: Deepfakes, Watermarks, Copyright and the Generative AI Supply Chain and Trademark Law
content:
AI companies agree to limit election ‘deepfakes’ but fall short of ban  (wapo)  Google, Microsoft, OpenAI, Meta, TikTok and Adobe developed an accord to respond to the proliferation of AI-generated content in elections    Related reading from Axios

Researchers Tested AI Watermarks—and Broke All of Them

Talkin’ ‘Bout AI Generation: Copyright and the Generative-AI Supply Chain – Katherine Lee* A. Feder Cooper† James Grimmelmann‡

DEPARTMENT OF COMMERCE Patent and Trademark Office
Inventorship Guidance for AI-assisted Inventions

Remarks of Benjamin Wiseman at the Harvard Journal of Law & Technology on Worker Surveillance and AI
